entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
